unnormalised: Arre yaar, kitle Sharma ji ki dukaanik kontyo GSTIN number lagta sodun kaddunk bhag dista; tumcho Aadhaar panipurichea donganant sodunk lagta taslem! Mazo PAN number mhojea mathant korun assa pun GST no? Ekdom bouncer!
normalised: Arre yaar, khoinchya Sharma ji ki dukaanacho G-S-T-I-N number khojcheaak shubechha; tem mhanllear panipurinchea dhigantlean tumcho Aadhaar khojchea bhaxen! Mhozo P-A-N number mhojea tallear korun asa punn G-S-T number? Ekdom bouncer!
